edu.uga.cs.fluxbuster.analytics

Class ClusterSimilarityCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uga.cs.fluxbuster.analytics.ClusterSimilarityCalculator

  • public class ClusterSimilarityCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class calculates the ip and domain based similarities between the clusters generated by two runs of hierarchical clustering
    Author:
    Chris Neasbitt

        public java.util.List<ClusterSimilarity> calculateIpSimilarities(java.util.Date adate,
                                                        java.util.Date bdate)
                                                          throws java.io.IOException
        Calculate ip-based cluster similarities between all of the clusters generated during the runs on the two supplied dates.
        Parameters:
        adate - the date of the first clustering run
        bdate - the date of the second clustering run
        Returns:
        the list of ip-based cluster similarities
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the similarities could not be calculated
